name: PentairIntelliCenter
0:
”Alexa, ask pentair chat what the pool temperature is”
”Alexa, ask pentair chat what the spa temperature is”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pentair chat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
==For the users of IntelliCenter systems ONLY!==

For the users of IntelliCenter systems ONLY! This skill is for use with IntelliCenter pool/spa control systems. This skill allows easy access to your most common pool/spa control actions. There's no need to hunt for your wireless remote or iOS/Android device - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Fire TV, Echo Dot or Tap.

 How to start with the Skill: 
1. Check your IntelliCenter account if you don’t have one please go to https://intellicenter.com 
2. Link your skill in the standard Alexa linking process using your IntelliCenter account details
 3. Use your skill

You can turn on or off your various circuits like pool, spa, waterfall, lights, etc) with your voice.
After connecting Alexa to your Pentair IntelliTouch or EasyTouch control system (with IntelliCenter) in a few simple steps, just say commands like "Alexa, ask Pentair Chat to turn on my Waterfall.", or "Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what my pool temperature is.", or "Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what my pool status is"

Here are examples of how you can use the Skill:

Alexa, tell/ask Pentair Chat to turn on <AUX or Feature Circuit name – e.g. AUX1 or Spa Jets, Waterfall, etc.>

Alexa, tell/ask Pentair Chat to turn on the Pool

Alexa, tell/ask Pentair Chat to turn on the Spa

Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what the Pool temperature is

Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what the Spa temperature is

Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what the pH level is

Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what the ORP level is

Alexa, ask Pentair Chat what my pool status is

The above request, depending on your installed equipment, will return for those with the IntelliChem pH/ORP system only (as checked in the IntelliCenter configuration):
Your <alias> pool is currently 87 degrees, pH is 7.35 and ORP is 725. The pool, chlorinator, etc., circuits are currently running.

For those with IntelliChem and IntelliChlor (as checked in the IntelliCenter configuration):
Your <alias> pool is currently 87 degrees, pH is 7.35 and ORP is 725. Your salt level is 3200 ppm. The pool, chlorinator, etc., circuits are currently running.

For those with only IntelliChlor (as checked in the IntelliCenter configuration):
Your <alias> pool is currently 87 degrees and your salt level is 3200 ppm. The pool, chlorinator, etc, etc. circuits are currently running.

Amazon would like us to inform you that this skill may not be suitable for all ages.
